item.title: Leveling down levels instead or up? Help!
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

         addSkillXP((20 * playerLevel[1]), 1);

That code does not lower attack, it raises it.

PS. Attack ID = 0 

         addSkillXP((20 * playerLevel[0]), 0);
                                                  ^    ^

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Well you seem like a pretty good coder and i havent had time to do this but try and morph this code a bit.

case 24: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Lower the attack!"); setAnimation(0x320); addSkillXP((20 * playerLevel[1]), 1); actionTimer = 20; } break;

Ill go work on making a Item form of this code.

item.title: Leveling down levels instead or up? Help!
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

I want to make it so when I use “Rat posion (ID=24)” on a player, it makes there attack level go from whatever they are at, to level 60 Attack.

I tried two things, and they did not work:

[code] if(itemUseID == 24) {

p2.setSkillLevel(0, 60, playerLevel[0]);
}[/code]

if(itemUseID == 24) { p2.setSkillLevel(0, 60, 210000); }

Does anyone know how to make it work?
Thanks.

Read full topic
